subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: Mucho Macho Man, a horse who has too often found himself just short of the winner’s circle, won the Breeders’ Cup in a race that was down to the wire.
snippet: Mucho Macho Man, a horse who has too often found himself just short of the winner’s circle, won the Breeders’ Cup in a race that was down to the wire.
